service.sql: select ltrim(rtrim(companyName)) c0,--"公司名称" sum(isnull(totalTaxBudget, 0)) c1 from financial_tax_year_plan where dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, month - 1, dateadd(yy, year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dStart.date}) <= 0 and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, month - 1, dateadd(yy, year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dEnd.date}) >= 0 and companyName in ${gs} group by companyName

select ltrim(rtrim(companyName)) c0,--"公司名称" sum(isnull( VAT ,0)) + sum(isnull( salesIncome ,0)) + sum(isnull( tariff ,0)) + sum(isnull( businessTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( urbanConstructionTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( educationSurtax ,0)) + sum(isnull( localEducationSurtax ,0)) + sum(isnull( stampTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( personalIncomeTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( buildingTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( landUseTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( landVTA ,0)) + sum(isnull( landOccupationTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( vehicleAndVesselTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( resourceTax ,0)) + sum(isnull( deedTax ,0)) s1 from financial_tax where dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, month - 1, dateadd(yy, year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')),${dStart.date}) <= 0 and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, month - 1, dateadd(yy, year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')),${dEnd.date}) >= 0 and companyName in ${gs} group by companyName
